```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

```

```{r scale_tufte, cache = TRUE}
(ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt + runif(1), y = mpg))
 + geom_point()
 + geom_rangeframe()
 + theme_tufte()
 + scale_x_tufte()
 + scale_y_tufte()
 )



```
